data.title: Denver Nuggets Roster
data.meta_description: Denver Nuggets scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Draft Rights to Nene Hilario, the #7 pick in the First Round of the 2002 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the New York Knicks on June 26, 2002. Nene Hilario signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 23, 2002. Nene Hilario re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 20, 2006.

Draft Rights to Ty Lawson, the #18 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the Minnesota Timberwolves on June 25, 2009. Ty Lawson signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 14, 2009.

Arron Afflalo was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the Detroit Pistons on July 13, 2009.

Wilson Chandler was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the New York Knicks on February 22, 2011.

Raymond Felton was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the New York Knicks on February 22, 2011.

Danilo Gallinari was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the New York Knicks on February 22, 2011.

Kosta Koufos was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the Minnesota Timberwolves on February 22, 2011.

Kenyon Martin was acquired in a sign and trade by the Denver Nuggets from the New Jersey Nets on July 15, 2004.

Timofey Mozgov was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the New York Knicks on February 22, 2011.

J.R. Smith was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the Chicago Bulls on July 20, 2006. J.R. Smith re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on August 21, 2008.
